title: Royal Orchid Hotels reports PAT of Rs 50.82 cr for FY24
description: Royal Orchid Hotels Limited reported a total income of Rs 312.70 crore for FY 2024, up from Rs 279.69 crore in FY 2023. In Q4 FY 2024, the chain's total income was Rs 82.30 crore, up from Rs 76.54 crore in Q4 FY 2023.
